channel.title: --pro-pk development team needed--
channel.description:
Here is the story,...
I plan on having a 317 based around pkerslyfe. I dont know about you, but i loved that server. I am currently hosting the server now and am getting tired with trying to learn all the things i need to code. If you have ever wanted another pkerlyfe around than here is your chance to help me.
This server started out as a pkplanet base and I've altered it quite a bit. It has grown a little, but now it is dying out because of it being unfinished. I swear to you though that once it is done than it will be epic.
What i am looking for is... 2 server coders (need java knowledge) 1 client coder(need java knowledge) 1 or 2 website coder( need html and php knowledge) 1 forum creator(need html knowledge) 2 or 3 forum mods(must be responsible and professional)
I am not accepting any applications from anyone under the age of 15. The application must be in the form of:
[code]NAME: AGE: APPLYING FOR: YEARS EXP: SKYPE: [/code]
Thank you for taking your time in reading this and to fill out the application. All members accepted must have a skype, but you do not need a mic.
[IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv34/3m0h4x/0000.png[/img]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Spots Filled~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Forum Mod: Da Vinci

I’ll make you a Runescape-Designed website

-Nameme123

item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

NAME: Will
AGE: 16
APPLYING FOR: Forum Mod
YEARS EXP: 3
SKYPE: No Sorry

I have been Forum mod on server’s such as Zgspk and Elitescape.

Both servers have closed down, so I am seeking a new oppurnuity. Your server looked interesting so I am applying.

Thanks,

Will

@Da_Vinci wrote:

NAME: Leonard
AGE: 14, don’t judge me by my age.
APPLYING FOR: Forum Moderator, Customer Support,
( I can do basic coding like HTML, some Java, but not your best pick )
YEARS EXP: Moderating 2-3 years. HTML 1 year (basic). Java few months (basic).
SKYPE: Yeah, and MSN. If accepted I’ll PM it to you.
OTHERS: I’m only 14 but I believe I’m more mature then half of tuh 1373spekin sxten yr ulds.

Thanks for your time,
Leonard.

EDIT: I can do spawnmaking aswell and making a server advertisement/video.
